title: WATCH: Tens of thousands of litres of alcohol go down drain in Johannesburg
text:
Joburg police disposed of thousands of litres of alcohol it confiscated. (supplied)

Gauteng police poured 630 000 litres of alcohol, which were confiscated from illegal liquor outlets, down the drain on Friday.

Lieutenant General Elias Mawela, Gauteng's provincial commissioner, said the liquor was confiscated between April 2018 and March 2019.

Mawela added that the police had also disposed of counterfeit goods worth over R500m earlier this year.

"We want to send out a loud and strong message to illegal traders that we mean business."
description: Gauteng police has poured 630 000l of alcohol, which were confiscated from illegal liquor outlets, down the drain.
